title: Studio Apartment For Rent
posting_body: ['A cozy Furnished Studio Apartment is for rent by the owner, in the Pelham Gardens Area.', 'Rent is $1,400.', 'This includes heat, electricity, warm water and Wifi.', 'There is a bedroom set with a queen bed and a dinette set.', 'The place is at the semi-first floor level of a private attached house.', 'Entrance is by the driveway of the house.', 'Bedroom is big, but living room area and kitchen are a bit narrow.', 'There is a portable air conditioning installed.', 'Stainless steel refrigerator is new.', 'There is a window in the bedroom.', 'Bathroom is modern and beautiful.', 'There are two closets.', 'Floor is made of elegant white tiles.', 'There is security camera at the entrance.', 'Quiet area.', 'The place is at a walking distance (0.42 miles) of 5 train Pelham Pkwy/Williamsbridge Station and 30 minutes to NYC.', 'No pets, NO SMOKING, no loud music, and no washing machine allowed.', 'Parking is accessible in the outside city nearby streets, but not in the premises.', 'If interested, call or text (718)775-5972.', 'Do not contact me for unsolicited services or brokers offers.', 'Thank you.']
